description: A group of proprietary formats employed by digital cameras that use a color filter array to capture image data. Raw files contain data captured by the sensors in the array.
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="formatCategory">still-image</field><field name="filenameExtension">cr2, crw, dcr, kdc, mrw, nef, orf, pef, raf, srf, x3f</field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>

relations.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections

name: Camera Raw Formats
